Build: I20070403

Not sure what's going on here. 
The attached log file (comment #1) includes a call to WM_PAINT, which is win32, not wpf, but the "LEAK->" spew is definitely from WPF specific code. 
I've installed I20070403-1110 and both win32 and wpf versions are starting up fine for me.

Created an attachment (id=62935)
Updated log

It turns out the previously attached log was from my session just before upgrading to the WPF build. This log is my actual stdout output from running with WPF.
It turns out it only fails to start with certain Eclipse preference settings. I will attach my pref file.

fixed > 20070404
The preference file was created on win32, and when imported to wpf no default stretch value was getting assigned to the font data.
